1.0.1.description: Added a Yoast modification feature preventing huge default images

1.0.2.description: Internationalization added through .mo and .po files and provided translations for Finnish and Swedish for the dashboard widgets

1.0.3.description: Added a check to the Dashboard Recent Widget to prevent non-object type errors if a CPT for some reason isn't present

1.0.4.description: Added an action to the string translation subfeature to correctly register strings

1.0.5.description: Added a new 'Style Guide' subfeature and a 'Tests' feature to parent it, updated README

1.0.6.description: Improved the Style Guide subfeature's default markup

1.0.7.description: Changed the default og:image function to always return 'large' regardless of the input value and attached the Twitter version of the wpseo filter to it

1.0.8.description: Change dashboard recent widget visuals to match with new widget dashboard aucor and position from normal to side

1.0.9.description: Renamed 'tests' feature 'debug' and added a wireframe-mode as a debug subfeature. Helpers is now it's own file
